amendment.description: An amendment in the nature of a substitute which seeks to add a complete new text.

action.text: Mr. Regula raised a point of order against the Obey amendment (A001). Mr. Regula stated that the Obey amendment contained tax and tariff measures, sought to change existing law, and constituted legislation in an appropriations bill. The Chair sustained the point of order.
Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Obey.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Obey.
